<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hurling Charge](/Feats.aspx?ID=6436) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 220 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Viking](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=268)

**Prerequisites**
[Viking Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6435)

**Requirements**
You're wielding a [thrown](/Traits.aspx?ID=711) weapon.

</column>

---

You make a ranged [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306) with your thrown weapon, [Stride](/Actions.aspx?ID=2305), and then Interact to draw another weapon. This Interact action doesn't trigger reactions.

**Special** If you are [raging](/Actions.aspx?ID=2802) and end the Stride adjacent to an enemy, that enemy is [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) against the next Strike you make against it with the weapon you drew before the end of your next turn.
name: Hurling Charge
